sentences.sContent: You’ve brought enough dishonour on your family already without causing any more trouble.
sentences.sCn: 你惹的麻烦已经让你的家人够丢脸的了，不用再添乱了。

synos.tran: 拒付；使丢脸；拒绝承兑；不履行（诺言等）

words.tran: 不名誉的；无耻的；不受尊重的（等于dishonorable）

trans.tranOther: loss of respect from other people, because you have behaved in a morally unacceptable way
